events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster for further evaluation by our recruitment team.
A recruiter familiar with software development roles has been assigned to oversee your application process and coordinate next steps.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, discussing your experience with software engineering and development practices.
You responded promptly with detailed answers to our screening questions, demonstrating strong technical knowledge and enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 10 AM UTC with our senior software engineers to discuss coding skills and system design.
